abstract: Did the Giant receiver "give himself up" and stop the play on purpose, or was it a mental blunder that was overlooked by the officials?
snippet: Did the Giant receiver "give himself up" and stop the play on purpose, or was it a mental blunder that was overlooked by the officials?
lead_paragraph: Rule 7, Section 2, Article 1(e) An official shall declare the ball dead and the down ended when a runner is out of bounds, or declares himself down by falling to the ground, or kneeling, and making no effort to advance.

headline.main: Did Officials Get the Victor Cruz Call Right?
